mapper.select: select distinct tsm.id, tsm.`name`, tsm.parent_id as pid, tsm.`type`, tsm.permission, tsm.path, tsm.icon from tb_sys_menu tsm inner join tb_sys_role_menu_relation tsrmr on tsm.id = tsrmr.menu_id inner join tb_sys_role tsr on tsrmr.role_id = tsr.id inner join tb_sys_user_role_relation tsurr on tsr.id = tsurr.role_id where tsurr.user_id = #{userId} and tsm.status = 1;
select id, name, permission, path, icon, parent_id as pid, sort, type, status, create_time from tb_sys_menu where id !=2 and parent_id !=2;
